physical_appearance: This is a purple and pink striped top. It has a high collar, pleated cuffs and two large pockets in front. The hem of the top features a lace border, with bird motifs. The top is long-sleeved.
sgcool_label_text: In a purple and pink striped fabric, this top has a high collar, pleated cuffs and large pockets on its front. A lace border with bird motifs is attached to its hem. This top may have been inspired by baju dalam, which was of a similar construction and was popular in the 20th century as an undergarment worn beneath organdie baju panjangs. This is part of a donation which contains a mixture of garments worn by Peranakan men and women.
subject_terms_1: birds (motifs) cultural diffusion tops (garments, general) Peranakan
subject_terms_2: Motifs Culture diffusion Clothing and dress Peranakan (Asian people)
